mapper.select: select ap.id ,ap.name,ap.info,ap.course_type as courseType,ap.charge,ap.duration,ap.year, article.id as authorId,manager.username as authorName from admission_plan ap left join article on ap.id=article.id left join manager on manager.id=article.author_id where ap.id=#{id}
